Our Farm

Farming is in our nature.

Sunny Acres Orchard is a growing operation (pun intended). Our current products include home harvested organic honey, fresh cucumbers, zucchini, tomatoes, sweet corn, green beans, chicken eggs, and a variety of pumpkins and sunflowers. Our cow/ beef operation is currently in the works.

Please Contact Us for inquiries!
